Sentencas: A modified sol-gel process was developed for the fabrication of sub-micrometer scale yttrium-doped barium zirconate (BZY) thin film at much lower processing temperatures.
Titulo: Fabrication of yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin films with sub-micrometer thickness by a sol-gel spin coating method

Sentencas: The film was fabricated by direct spin-coating of the sol on a Si3N4 passivated Si substrate, followed by low temperature thermal annealing at 1000 degrees C, and single BZY phase without barium carbonate residue was obtained.
Titulo: Fabrication of yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin films with sub-micrometer thickness by a sol-gel spin coating method

Sentencas: A 200 nm-thick thin film without obvious through-film cracks was fabricated with optimized process parameters of sol concentration and heating rate.
Titulo: Fabrication of yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin films with sub-micrometer thickness by a sol-gel spin coating method

Sentencas: The stoichiometry of the BZY thin film was well-controlled and no Ba evaporation was observed due to the low processing temperature.
Titulo: Fabrication of yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin films with sub-micrometer thickness by a sol-gel spin coating method

Sentencas: The combination of sol-gel and spin coating method can be a promising alternative to vacuum-based thin film deposition techniques for the fabrication of sub-micrometer scale BZY thin film.
Titulo: Fabrication of yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin films with sub-micrometer thickness by a sol-gel spin coating method
Fabrication of yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin films with sub-micrometer thickness by a sol-gel spin coating method
